availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Mary Cooley Snider. Father of Arnold Snider, Mary Snider, Esther Snider, Joshua Snider, Johns Snider, and Lewis Snider.
Father of Arnold Snider and a farmer in Greenup County.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup, [City/District], p. 21; Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1964 Ancestry, Deaths, Lewis County, 1924; Find A Grave, "James Snider (1897-1880)," Memorial #156525548, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=156525548 (accessed May, 26, 2017).
